pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Emby brings together your personal videos, music, photos, and live television.
* automatically converts and streams your personal media on the fly to play on any device. * makes it easy to enjoy your personal media while away from home. Just sign in and play. * Stream Live TV to any device, manage your DVR, and enjoy your library of recordings. * Sync your personal media to smart phones and tablets for easy offline access. Automatically sync new content as you add it. * Emby organizes your content into easy and elegant presentations. Your personal media will never look the same. * Easy web-based tools help you edit metadata and images, search for subtitles, and more. * Easily control content access for your children. Monitor and remote control their sessions as you need to. * Specify parental restrictions for your children, create access schedules, time limits, and more. * Emby automatically detects Dlna devices on your network so that you can easily send content, remote control, and more. * Send videos, music, photos, and Live TV to Chromecast with ease. * Sync your personal media to the cloud for easy backup, archiving, and converting. Store your content in multiple resolutions to enable direct streaming from any device.
